title: Travis Scott’s Alleged ~Secret GF~ Spilled A Bunch Of Tea And It Is Scalding, M8s, SCALDING
text:
It was recently revealed that Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott’s split was prompted by the fact that the rapper has been sliding into other girls’ DMs.

Now, receipts once shared by the woman in question have been brought to light and the evidence is damning.

A 27-year-old model named Rojean Kar (@YungSweetRo on Instagram) has reportedly been linked to the rapper for quite some time now, even attending his birthday bash earlier this year.

Back in March, Ro took to the ‘gram to drop a bunch of receipts, claiming that she has been dating Scott for six years and that she’s his ~main chick~ and Kylie is his ~side chick~.

The sneaky gal has switched her profile to private but luckily spicy FB page Superficial has reshared the tea.

In the below screenshots, it is alleged that Travis frequents her bedroom as seen by the pics of his shoes in her room.

She also claims that Kylie often blocks then unblocks her, just to keep tabs on her competition.

“How many times a day do you block & unblock me girl,” she wrote.

She once posted a sultry snap of herself in bed with the caption: “tell ur bd [baby daddy] i said thx,” followed by a laughter emoji, which is believed to have been aimed at the pair.

Other photos show that she and Travis were allegedly at the same locations at the same time on several occasions, including a game arcade and a snow trip.

Uh oh… looks like Travis has got himself into a sticky situation, people are saying he’s been keeping his main girl a… Posted by Superficial on Thursday, 3 October 2019

The below picture also appears to show Ro all nestled up to Travis along with a teddy bear.

While both Kylie and Travis have yet to react to this rumour, the beauty boss recently broke her silence about the split and denied meeting up with ex Tyga.

“The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is,” Jenner said.

READ MORE Kylie Jenner Breaks Silence On Travis Scott Split To Address Spicy Tyga Rumours

“There was no “2am date with Tyga”. You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at. Travis and i are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi our friendship and our daughter is priority.”

Again, the girl’s Insta is now on private so we can’t give you any more tea but we’ll defs be keeping tabs on our sources for more on this wild, wild turn of events.
description: Rojean Kar, the girl who has allegedly been dating Travis Scott for years, shared a bunch of screenshots and receipts about Kylie Jenner on Instagram.
